ChaiONE Code Challenge

Anagram

Write a program that, given a word and a list of possible anagrams, selects the correct one(s).

Given "listen" and %w(enlists google inlets banana) the program should return “inlets”.

Tests

Hint: Remove the skip message from the next test once the first test passes.

When all the tests are passing, post the result to a private gist.

Email the link to the created gist to kelly@chaione.com.

Source

If you have any questions, please contact Kelly.
